Factory

Class Platform

  • java.lang.Object
    • Factory.FactoryObject
      • Factory.Platform
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SolidObject, java.lang.Runnable

    public class Platform
extends FactoryObject
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Platform is a Factory object. The Platform is a solid object and does not move.

        canvas, collision, dimension, graphics, running, x, xSize, y, ySize
